name: Fetch with Georgia!
description:
FETCH WITH GEORGIA!

It's every dog's favourite game... Fetch! Run away from George the dog! Don't let her get you! Run! run!

all 4 of your classic dog environment! Grass! Retro! Flesh! Underwater!

CONTROLS 

WASD - Move player

SPACE - Jump

SHIFT - Sprint

Camera is static and won't turn - map has 4ish corridoors and loops back around on itself - for endless fetching!

A Game by Harry, commissioned by Darby, for Brian. Uploaded with permission.

Merry Christmas Brian I hope it's a merry and christmas day - Harry

Want your own horrible, personalised game?
